    • Method Detail

      • add

        public DatasetDescriptor add​(DatasetDescriptor desc)
        Adds the specified DatasetDescriptor to the datastore. The returned instance is the specific instance that will be retained by the datastore and will have an updated ID.
        Parameters:
        desc - The descriptor to be added
        Returns:
        A new DatasetDescriptor with an updated ID.

      • remove

        public void remove​(DatasetDescriptor desc)
        Removes the specified DatasetDescriptor from the datastore. The associated working directory is NOT deleted.
        Parameters:
        desc - The DatasetDescriptor

      • remove

        public void remove​(DatasetDescriptor desc,
                   boolean deleteWorkingDir)
        Removes the specified DatasetDescriptor from the datastore.
        Parameters:
        desc - The DatasetDescriptor
        deleteWorkingDir - true to delete the working directory associated with the descriptor, false otherwise.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the content but DOES NOT delete the associated working directories.

      • clear

        public void clear​(boolean deleteWorkingDir)
        Clears out the current contents of the datastore. Optionally deletes the associated working directories.
        Parameters:
        deleteWorkingDir - true to delete the associated working directories, false otherwise.

      • queryDatasetsCount

        public int queryDatasetsCount​(RasterDataStore.DatasetQueryParameters params)
        Description copied from interface: RasterDataStore
        Returns the number of results for the specified query. Adheres to the same basic contract as RasterDataStore.queryDatasets(DatasetQueryParameters).
        Parameters:
        params - The query parameters. If null all datasets are returned, else, only those satisfying the criteria of the specified parameters are returned.
        Returns:
        The number of results matching the query criteria.

      • getCoverage

        public Geometry getCoverage​(java.lang.String dataset,
                            java.lang.String type)
        Description copied from interface: RasterDataStore
        Returns the coverage for the specified dataset and imagery type combination.

        If dataset is non-null and type is non-null, the returned Geometry will be the coverage for that imagery type for the specified dataset. If dataset is non-null and type is null, the returned Geometry will be the union of the coverages for all imagery types for that dataset. If dataset is null and type is non-null, the returned Geometry will be the union of the coverage for that imagery type across all datasets.

        Specified by:
        getCoverage in interface RasterDataStore
        Overrides:
        getCoverage in class AbstractRasterDataStore
        Parameters:
        dataset - The dataset name (may be null)
        type - The imagery type (may be null)
        Returns:
        The coverage for the specified dataset and imagery type combination

      • getMinimumResolution

        public double getMinimumResolution​(java.lang.String dataset,
                                   java.lang.String type)
        Description copied from interface: RasterDataStore
        Returns the minimum resolution for the specified dataset and imagery type combination.

        If dataset is non-null and type is non-null, the returned resolution will be the minimum resolution for that imagery type for the specified dataset. If dataset is non-null and type is null, the returned resolution will be the minimum of the resolutions for all imagery types for that dataset. If dataset is null and type is non-null, the returned resolution will be the minimum resolution for that imagery type across all datasets.

        Parameters:
        dataset - The dataset name (may be null)
        type - The imagery type (may be null)
        Returns:
        The minimum resolution for the specified dataset and imagery type combination

      • getMaximumResolution

        public double getMaximumResolution​(java.lang.String dataset,
                                   java.lang.String type)
        Description copied from interface: RasterDataStore
        Returns the maximum resolution for the specified dataset and imagery type combination.

        If dataset is non-null and type is non-null, the returned resolution will be the maximum resolution for that imagery type for the specified dataset. If dataset is non-null and type is null, the returned resolution will be the maximum of the resolutions for all imagery types for that dataset. If dataset is null and type is non-null, the returned resolution will be the maximum resolution for that imagery type across all datasets.

        Parameters:
        dataset - The dataset name (may be null)
        type - The imagery type (may be null)
        Returns:
        The maximum resolution for the specified dataset and imagery type combination

      • refresh

        public void refresh()
        Description copied from interface: RasterDataStore
        Refreshes the data store. Any invalid entries are dropped.

      • isAvailable

        public boolean isAvailable()
        Description copied from interface: RasterDataStore
        Returns a flag indicating whether or not the data store is currently available. In the event that the data store resides on a remote server, this method may return false when no connection with that server can be established.

        This method should always return false after the Disposable.dispose() method has been invoked.

        Returns:
        true if the data store is available, false otherwise.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Description copied from interface: Disposable
        Releases all resources associated with the Object. The Object should not be used following an invocation of this method and any usage will result in undefined and possible application ending behavior.
